0011010101011101 1011110100011100 0 -> sum: 1111001001111001, cout: 0
1010010010011000 0000011101101100 1 -> sum: 1010110000000101, cout: 0

0011001110100100 0010101100000000 0 -> sum: 0101111010100100, cout: 0
1100000001000010 1011100100111010 0 -> sum: 0111100101111100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
